heading: African Americans in musical theater.
alt-heading: African Americans in the musical theater.
general-note: Here are entered works on the portrayal of African Americans in musical theater. Works on African Americans who are involved in production of musical theater are entered under headings such as. African Americans in the performing arts; African American theatrical producers and directors;. and similar headings. Works on African Americans as performers in musical theater are entered under the particular subject, e.g.. African American actors; African American musicians; African American singers;. and similar headings..
